code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  numPermsDISequence ( string  s )  {   constexpr  int  kMod  =  1'000'000'007 ;   const  int  n  =  s . length ();       vector < vector < int >>  dp ( n  +  1 ,  vector < int > ( n  +  1 ));     for  ( int  j  =  0 ;  j  <=  n ;  ++ j )   dp [ 0 ][ j ]  =  1 ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <=  n ;  ++ i )   if  ( s [ i  -  1 ]  ==  'I' )  {      int  postfixsum  =  0 ;   for  ( int  j  =  n  -  i ;  j  >=  0 ;  -- j )  {   postfixsum  =  ( postfixsum  +  dp [ i  -  1 ][ j  +  1 ])  %  kMod ;   dp [ i ][ j ]  =  postfixsum ;   }   }  else  {      int  prefix  =  0 ;   for  ( int  j  =  0 ;  j  <=  n  -  i ;  ++ j )  {   prefix  =  ( prefix  +  dp [ i  -  1 ][ j ])  %  kMod ;   dp [ i ][ j ]  =  prefix ;   }   }   return  dp [ n ][ 0 ];   }  };
